snippet: The suggestions include better coordination with the federal government and more transparent state government finances.
abstract: State Budget Crisis Task Force's recommendations for addressing the long-term fiscal problems facing the states include better coordination with the federal government and more transparent state government finances.

byline.original: By MARY WILLIAMS WALSH and MICHAEL COOPER

lead_paragraph: The suggestions include better coordination with the federal government and more transparent state government finances.

headline.main: Recommendations for State and National Policy Makers
headline.print_headline: Recommendations for State and National Policy Makers
